mapper.insert: insert into tregulation (number, policyName, policyCode, department, riskLevel, bizEffect, status, source, keyWord, linkedBiz, linkedEcommerce, bizModel, alert, legalLevel, policyType, categoryOne, categoryTwo, categoryThree, releaseDate, effectDate, vattribute, f23, gl, action, owner, addUser, addTime, editUser, editTime, isDelete, note, localPolicy, keyPolicy, qaqr, regulationId, introduction, typicalProduct, interpretation) values (#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{policyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{risklevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizeffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkedbiz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkedecommerce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bizmodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legallevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{policytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categorytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categorythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releasedate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{effectdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{vattribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{f23,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{edituser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{localpolicy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keypolicy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qaqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regulationid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{typicalproduct,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{interpretation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into tregulation
number,
policyName,
policyCode,
department,
riskLevel,
bizEffect,
status,
source,
keyWord,
linkedBiz,
linkedEcommerce,
bizModel,
alert,
legalLevel,
policyType,
categoryOne,
categoryTwo,
categoryThree,
releaseDate,
effectDate,
vattribute,
f23,
gl,
action,
owner,
addUser,
addTime,
editUser,
editTime,
isDelete,
note,
localPolicy,
keyPolicy,
qaqr,
regulationId,
introduction,
typicalProduct,
interpretation,
#{number,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{policyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{policycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{risklevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bizeffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{linkedbiz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{linkedecommerce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bizmodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{alert,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{legallevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{policytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{categoryone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{categorytwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{categorythree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{releasedate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{effectdate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{vattribute,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{f23,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{adduser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{edituser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{edittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isdelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{localpolicy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{keypolicy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{qaqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{regulationid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{typicalproduct,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
#{interpretation,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT count(0) FROM tregulation rg WHERE rg.isdelete = '0' AND 1=1
and rg.policyName like '%${policyName}%'
and rg.policyCode like '%${policyCode}%'
and rg.department like '%${department}%'
and rg.riskLevel like '%${riskLevel}%'
and rg.status like '%${status}%'
and rg.source like '%${source}%'
and rg.bizEffect like '%${bizEffect}%'
and rg.linkedBiz ="Y"
and rg.linkedEcommerce ="Y"
and rg.localPolicy ="Y"
and rg.keyPolicy ="Y"
and rg.qaqr ="Y"
ORDER BY ${sort}
${order}

SELECT rg.regulationId, rg.number, rg.policyName, rg.policyCode, rg.department, rg.riskLevel, rg.bizEffect, rg.`status`, rg.source, rg.keyWord, rg.linkedBiz, rg.linkedEcommerce, rg.bizModel, rg.alert, rg.legalLevel, rg.policyType, rg.categoryOne, rg.categoryTwo, rg.categoryThree, rg.introduction, rg.releaseDate, rg.effectDate, rg.typicalProduct, rg.f23, rg.gl, rg.action, rg.`addUser`, rg.addTime, rg.`editUser`, rg.editTime, rg.`owner` , rg.localPolicy, rg.keyPolicy, rg.qaqr, rg.interpretation FROM tregulation rg WHERE 1 = 1 and rg.isdelete = '0' LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}

SELECT rg.regulationId, rg.number, rg.policyName, rg.policyCode, rg.department, rg.riskLevel, rg.bizEffect, rg.`status`, rg.source, rg.keyWord, rg.linkedBiz, rg.linkedEcommerce, rg.bizModel, rg.alert, rg.legalLevel, rg.policyType, rg.categoryOne, rg.categoryTwo, rg.categoryThree, rg.introduction, rg.releaseDate, rg.effectDate, rg.typicalProduct, rg.f23, rg.gl, rg.action, rg.`addUser`, rg.addTime, rg.`editUser`, rg.editTime, rg.`owner` , rg.localPolicy, rg.keyPolicy, rg.qaqr, rg.interpretation FROM tregulation rg WHERE 1 = 1 and rg.isdelete = '0'
and rg.policyName like '%${policyName}%'
and rg.policyCode like '%${policyCode}%'
and rg.department like '%${department}%'
and rg.riskLevel like '%${riskLevel}%'
and rg.status like '%${status}%'
and rg.source like '%${source}%'
and rg.bizEffect like '%${bizEffect}%'
and rg.linkedBiz ="Y"
and rg.linkedEcommerce ="Y"
and rg.localPolicy ="Y"
and rg.keyPolicy ="Y"
and rg.qaqr ="Y"
ORDER BY ${sort}
${order}
LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}
